languages.text: {n}Кибелла качает головой.{/n} "Ты ошибаешься, Домин. Я слышу твои слова, но также... {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_StillDoubts}слышу шепоты чудовищ{/d}, блуждающих в моем разуме. И они рады, что Эрэбис не умрут. Ибо эти люди и есть источник моих сомнений — пустых надежд, призраков привязанностей. Слабостей, что неугодны Неумирающему. Только оборвав их нити, я докажу, что готова всецело служить Ему".

traits.locale_text: {n}Кибелла качает головой.{/n} "Ты ошибаешься, Домин. Я слышу твои слова, но также... {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_StillDoubts}слышу шепоты чудовищ{/d}, блуждающих в моем разуме. И они рады, что Эрэбис не умрут. Ибо эти люди и есть источник моих сомнений — пустых надежд, призраков привязанностей. Слабостей, что неугодны Неумирающему. Только оборвав их нити, я докажу, что готова всецело служить Ему".

languages.text: {n}Kibellah shakes her head.{/n} "You are wrong, Domin. I hear your words, but I also... {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_StillDoubts}hear the whispers of monsters{/d} wandering through my mind. And they are glad that the Erebis will not die. For these people are the source of my doubts — empty hopes, the ghosts of attachments. Weaknesses that displease the Undying One. Only by cutting their threads will I prove that I am ready to serve Him fully."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла качает головой.{/n} "Ты ошибаешься, Домин. languages.text: {n}Kibellah menea la cabeza.{/n} «Se equivoca, Domin. Entiendo lo que dice, pero... {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_StillDoubts}también oigo susurrar a los monstruos{/d} que merodean por mi mente. Y les alegra que los Erebis no vayan a morir. Esa gente son la causa de mis dudas: una esperanza vacua, la quimera del apego emocional. Una debilidad que desagrada al Inmortal. Cortar esos hilos es la única manera de demostrar que estoy lista para servirle plenamente».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah shakes her head.{/n} "You are wrong, Domin. I hear your words, but I also... {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_StillDoubts}hear the whispers of monsters{/d} wandering through my mind. And they are glad that the Erebis will not die. For these people are the source of my doubts — empty hopes, the ghosts of attachments. Weaknesses that displease the Undying One. Only by cutting their threads will I prove that I am ready to serve Him fully."

Esa gente son la causa de mis dudas: una esperanza vacua, la quimera del apego emocional. Una debilidad que desagrada al Inmortal. Cortar esos hilos es la única manera de demostrar que estoy lista para servirle plenamente».

languages.text: {n}キベラは首を横に振った。{/n}「あなたは間違っている、ドミン。あなたの言葉を聞こえたが、同時に…{d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_StillDoubts}怪物たちのささやきを聞け{/d}、彼らは私の魂をさまよっている。そして、彼らはエレビスが死なないことを喜んでいる。彼らは私の疑念の源だからだ。空虚な希望、執着の亡霊。不死の者を不愉快にさせる弱点だ。彼らの糸を断ち切ることでしか、私は神に完全に仕える用意があることを証明できない」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah shakes her head.{/n} "You are wrong, Domin. I hear your words, but I also... {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_StillDoubts}hear the whispers of monsters{/d} wandering through my mind. And they are glad that the Erebis will not die. For these people are the source of my doubts — empty hopes, the ghosts of attachments. Weaknesses that displease the Undying One. Only by cutting their threads will I prove that I am ready to serve Him fully."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラは首を横に振った。{/n}「あなたは間違っている、ドミン。あなたの言葉を聞こえたが、同時に…{d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_StillDoubts}怪物たちのささやきを聞け{/d}、彼らは私の魂をさまよっている。そして、彼らはエレビスが死なないことを喜んでいる。彼らは私の疑念の源だからだ。空虚な希望、執着の亡霊。不死の者を不愉快にさせる弱点だ。彼らの糸を断ち切ることでしか、私は神に完全に仕える用意があることを証明できない」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈摇了摇头。{/n}“你错了，秘者。我听到了你的话语，但我也同样……{d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_StillDoubts}听到怪物的窃窃私语{/d}徘徊在我的脑海之中。那些怪物很高兴伊雷比斯家族能继续存活，因为他们代表着虚假的希望与过去的依恋。他们是我怀疑的根源，是我的弱点，这令不死之神很是不悦。只有切断了他们的丝线，我才能证明我做好了全身心侍奉祂的准备。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah shakes her head.{/n} "You are wrong, Domin. I hear your words, but I also... {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_StillDoubts}hear the whispers of monsters{/d} wandering through my mind. And they are glad that the Erebis will not die. For these people are the source of my doubts — empty hopes, the ghosts of attachments. Weaknesses that displease the Undying One. Only by cutting their threads will I prove that I am ready to serve Him fully."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈摇了摇头。{/n}“你错了，秘者。我听到了你的话语，但我也同样……{d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_StillDoubts}听到怪物的窃窃私语{/d}徘徊在我的脑海之中。那些怪物很高兴伊雷比斯家族能继续存活，因为他们代表着虚假的希望与过去的依恋。他们是我怀疑的根源，是我的弱点，这令不死之神很是不悦。只有切断了他们的丝线，我才能证明我做好了全身心侍奉祂的准备。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Ihr irrt Euch, Domin. Ich höre Eure Worte, aber auch ... {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_StillDoubts}das Flüstern der Monster{/d} in meinem Verstand. Und sie sind froh, dass die Erebis nicht sterben werden. Denn diese Leute sind der Ursprung meiner Zweifel ... leere Hoffnungen, die Geister von Bindungen. Schwächen, die dem Todlosen missfallen. Ich muss ihre Fäden durchtrennen, um zu beweisen, dass ich bereit bin, Ihm vollständig zu dienen."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah shakes her head.{/n} "You are wrong, Domin. I hear your words, but I also... {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_StillDoubts}hear the whispers of monsters{/d} wandering through my mind. And they are glad that the Erebis will not die. For these people are the source of my doubts — empty hopes, the ghosts of attachments. Weaknesses that displease the Undying One. Only by cutting their threads will I prove that I am ready to serve Him fully."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Ihr irrt Euch, Domin. Ich höre Eure Worte, aber auch ... {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_StillDoubts}das Flüstern der Monster{/d} in meinem Verstand. Und sie sind froh, dass die Erebis nicht sterben werden. Denn diese Leute sind der Ursprung meiner Zweifel ... leere Hoffnungen, die Geister von Bindungen. Schwächen, die dem Todlosen missfallen. Ich muss ihre Fäden durchtrennen, um zu beweisen, dass ich bereit bin, Ihm vollständig zu dienen."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah secoue la tête.{/n} « Vous avez tort, Domin. J'entends ce que vous dites, mais… {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_StillDoubts}j'entends également les murmures des monstres{/d} qui rôdent dans mon esprit. Et ils se réjouissent de savoir que les Erebis ne mourront pas. Car ces gens sont à l'origine de mes doutes. Ils représentent l'espoir perdu, le spectre de l'attachement. Des faiblesses qui déplaisent à l'Immortel. Si je veux prouver que je suis prête à me consacrer pleinement à Son service, je dois couper leurs fils. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah shakes her head.{/n} "You are wrong, Domin. I hear your words, but I also... {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_StillDoubts}hear the whispers of monsters{/d} wandering through my mind. And they are glad that the Erebis will not die. For these people are the source of my doubts — empty hopes, the ghosts of attachments. Weaknesses that displease the Undying One. Only by cutting their threads will I prove that I am ready to serve Him fully."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah secoue la tête.{/n} « Vous avez tort, Domin. J'entends ce que vous dites, mais… {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_StillDoubts}j'entends également les murmures des monstres{/d} qui rôdent dans mon esprit. Et ils se réjouissent de savoir que les Erebis ne mourront pas. Car ces gens sont à l'origine de mes doutes. Ils représentent l'espoir perdu, le spectre de l'attachement. Des faiblesses qui déplaisent à l'Immortel. Si je veux prouver que je suis prête à me consacrer pleinement à Son service, je dois couper leurs fils. »

languages.text: {n}Kibellah başını sallıyor.{/n} "Yanlış biliyorsun Domin. Sözlerini dinliyorum ama aynı zamanda... Zihnimde dolanıp duran {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_StillDoubts}canavarların fısıltılarını da dinliyorum{/d}. Canavarlar, Erebislerin ölmemelerinden memnun. Çünkü bu insanlar boş umutların, bağlılığın yankılarından ibaret kuşkularımın kaynağı. Ölmeyen'i kızdıran zayıflıklar... Yalnızca ipliklerini keserek O'na tamamıyla hizmet etmeye hazır olduğumu kanıtlayabilirim."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah shakes her head.{/n} "You are wrong, Domin. I hear your words, but I also... {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_StillDoubts}hear the whispers of monsters{/d} wandering through my mind. And they are glad that the Erebis will not die. For these people are the source of my doubts — empty hopes, the ghosts of attachments. Weaknesses that displease the Undying One. Only by cutting their threads will I prove that I am ready to serve Him fully."
